actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act of 1973 to provide for preferential enrollment of disabled veterans in programs under that Act.

summary.text: Amends the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act of 1973 to require that disabled veterans be given opportunities to participate in the comprehensive manpower services programs and the public service employment programs thereunder at a rate in excess of the rate of unemployment among such veterans. Directs that special consideration be given disabled veterans in the public service employment programs. Specifies disabled veterans as a group eligible for additional manpower services under such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act of 1973 to provide for preferential enrollment of disabled veterans in programs under that Act.
